title: FolkArt 8 oz Acrylic Paint, Silver Metallic
description: FolkArt Metallic Acrylic Paint is the artist-quality formula that crafters love! With an expansive shimmering color palette, FolkArt Metallic Acrylic Paints offer a rich, creamy consistency for exceptional blending and shading with an eye-catching sheen. Developed for both stroke work painting and a variety of decorative arts and crafts, the FolkArt line of metallic acrylic paints feature amazing colors with brilliant coverage. Use any of these superior quality colors with FolkArt’s line of paint brushes, tools, and stencils to give your project a fresh, elegant look. A preferred brand among crafters, painters, and artists, FolkArt Acrylic Paint is a staple in any art supplies. Whether you are a novice or expert crafter, you'll love the versatility of this acrylic paint as part of your arts and crafts supplies. From beautiful hand paintings to stylish stenciling and design techniques, FolkArt Metallic Acrylic Paint delivers outstanding results!
